WorkItem.Description:
After attempting to implement source-maps in my own tsc implementation I found that it's currently impossible to override the `createFile` method in 
`TypeScriptCompiler.prototype.emit = function (outputMany, createFile)` 

to return source-map code, which is passed in to 

`emitter.setSourceMappings(new TypeScript.SourceMapper(fname, outFname, outf, createFile(outFname + TypeScript.SourceMapper.MapFileExtension)));`

Comments.Message: Actually, nevermind.  Please close this issue.
